channel.title: Good songs to be blazed to
channel.description:
i like to listen to kottonmouth kings
and some other stuff
i think the best song is ayo for yayo
because it sounds great
what about you?

item.title: Good songs to be blazed to
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

The Beatles: Magical Mystery Tour, I am the Walrus, Sgt. Pepper’s Lonely Hearts Club Band, With a Little Help from my Friends, Lucy in the Sky With Diamonds, Being for the Benefit of Mr. Kite!
The last one is especially trippy.
I also listen to a lot of techno: Anamanaguchi, Justice, LCD Soundsystems, Cut Copy, DJ Tiesto, Kavinsky, Mr. Ozio, SebastiAn and Symbian.

Read full topic
item.source: Good songs to be blazed to

item.title: Good songs to be blazed to
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

I agree with Tom Petty and Steve Miller Band (although i haven’t tried them myself while smoking). I suggest Electric Wizard, Sleep, Esoteric etc. Really heavy/psychedelic music that will blast your brains to the sun.

Read full topic
item.source: Good songs to be blazed to

item.title: Good songs to be blazed to
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I used to listen to kottonmouth kings a few years ago. They were kinda posers but they had some good rap/songs about weed lol.

There’s a few lil wayne songs I like blazing to, though I’m not a fan of him. Shoot me down is a sick song though, and “Get high, rule the world” I have to say is awesome. “Fuck a nigga thoughts” is also a good one. But for the most part I hate lil wayne though. I can’t help but love those songs though.

Sam roberts is awesome to blaze to. Ben harper is awesome. Jack johnson is awesome. Steve miller band is great and so is sublime. But nothing beats Tom Petty. Theres too many to say though.

The only thing better then listening to music while baked is listening to music while you get baked.

Read full topic
